author: Paul Brennan
title: European Commission: Members should coordinate on virus curbs
description: Italy, Spain, Austria, Finland and Denmark begin to lift movement restrictions as their infections numbers ease.
content:
As some countries in Europe ease movement control restrictions over the coronavirus pandemic, European Commission (EC) President Ursula von der Leyen urged member states to work together to ensure a coordinated response.
And the body said a gradual lifting o… [+89 chars]
